 
{{Server function}}
{{New items|3.014|1.4|
This function returns a [[/table.md|table]] containing all accounts that were logged onto from specified [[/serial.md|serial]]. If the serial is empty string, it will return all accounts that were never logged onto.
}}


==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
table getAccountsBySerial ( string serial )
</syntaxhighlight> 
{{OOP|This function is a static function underneath the Account class.|Account.getAllBySerial||}}
===Required Arguments=== 
*'''serial:''' The [[/serial.md|serial]] to get accounts from

===Returns===
Returns ''[[/table.md|table]]'' containing the accounts associated with specified serial. Returns ''false'' if invalid arguments were specified.

==Example== 
This example adds command ''getAccounts'' that outputs the number of accounts a player has in the chat box.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addCommandHandler("getAccounts", 
	function (player, cmd)
		local serial = getPlayerSerial(player)
		local accounts = getAccountsBySerial(serial)
		outputChatBox("You have " .. #accounts .. " accounts.", player)
	end)
</syntaxhighlight>
